sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./index.scss" export default function Login() { const [account, setAccount] = useState("") const [password, setPassword] = useState("") const [showPassword, setShowPassword] = useState(false) const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() console.log("submit", account, password) } const handleSave = (event, type) => { const { target } = event switch (type) { case "account": setAccount(target.value) break case "password": setPassword(target.value) break default: break } } const handlePassword = (event, type) => { event.preventDefault() console.log("click") switch (type) { case "showPassword": setShowPassword(true) console.log("click") break case "hidePassword": setShowPassword(false) console.log("click") break default: break } } return (

帳號：

handleSave(event, "account")} className='item__input' value={account} maxLength={20} type="text" />

密碼：

handleSave(event, "password")} className='item__input' value={password} maxLength={20} type="text" />
) }
